name: Sirin Head
description: The Sirin Head , based on a Sirin horror skins, a premium Skin that you can get it for free.

name: Backwards cap
description: The backwards cap is a pale blue basketball cap with the front of the cap facing backwards.

name: Brain Slug
description: The Brain Slug resembles a small blobby lime creature with a single eye that is visually similar to the pet with the same name. It is similar to the brainslug pet in appearance.

name: Bush hat
description: The bush hat is a brown hat with a wide rim and what appears to be a rope around the base.

name: Captain hat
description: The captain hat is a white hat with a golden badge and dark rim on the front.

name: Flowerpot hat
description: The flowerpot hat consists of a brown flowerpot with a red flower poking out of the top.

name: Double top hat
description: The double top hat consists of two black top hats stacked on together.

name: Goggles
description: The goggles are brown-gray steampunk-style goggles which sit on the top of the player's head.

name: Hard hat
description: The hard hat is a yellow, dome-like hat.

name: Military hat
description: The military hat is visually similar to the police hat, but is green with a differently-shaped golden badge on the front.

name: Paper hat
description: The paper hat consists of paper, which seems to be folded into a hat.

name: Party hat
description: The party hat is cone shaped with green, blue, red, yellow and orange stripes and a pink frilly rim.

name: Police hat
description: The police hat visually similar to the military hat, but blue in color and with a differently shaped golden badge.

name: Stethoscope
description: The stethoscope is a round mirror attached to a black band that goes around a player's head.

name: Top hat
description: This hat is a plain black top hat.

name: Towel wizard
description: The towel wizard is presumably a towel, and it has been wrapped up in itself to vaguely resemble a pointy wizard's hat.

name: Ushanka
description: The ushanka is a fuzzy light gray hat with the Wall logo on the front.

name: Viking
description: The Viking consists of a golden dome-shaped helmet with two white horns on either side

name: Wall guard cap
description: The Wall guard cap consists of a blocky gray cap that has the Wall logo on the front, as well as a front-facing brim.

name: Snowman hat
description: The snowman hat resembles a small snowman with a black top hat and a purple scarf.

name: Antlers
description: The antlers resemble brown reindeer antlers, with small light brown ears set slightly further down on the headband.

name: Christmas lights hat
description: The Christmas lights hat seems to be a string of three oversized fairy lights, in the colors red, yellow and green.

name: Santa hat
description: The Santa hat is based on the hat that Santa Claus wears, red with a fluffy white rim.

name: Christmas tree hat
description: The Christmas tree hat is a miniature version of a Christmas tree, with yellow and red lights. Interestingly, these lights appear on the outline, making this hat the only hat to have features on its outline.

name: Present hat
description: The present hat resembles a small silver and golden wrapped present with a small bow on top.

name: Candy canes hat
description: The candy canes hat resembles a couple of candy canes that sit on the character's head like a pair of horns.

name: Elf hat
description: The elf hat is a stripy green and silver hat with a white bobble on the end, and also has a pair of grey-blue ears poking out from under the hat.

name: 2019 yellow party hat
description: The 2019 yellow party hat is a golden and white hat with '2019' written on it, and a golden bobble on the top.

name: White hat
description: The white hat is a plain white top hat with a black band around the middle.

name: Crown
description: This hat is a plain shiny golden crown with three points.

name: Eyebrows
description: The eyebrows are two black lines that seemingly hover above the character's head.

name: Angel halo
description: The angel halo is a shiny yellow loop that hovers above the character's head.

name: Elf cap
description: The elf cap is a lime hat that folds over at the end.

name: Flat cap
description: The flat cap is a flat brown cap with a darker brown rim.
